frontmatter.title: SublimeText plugins for writing a book in markdown

node.excerpt:
I'm currently involved on writing The book of OpenLayers3 using the great LeanPub platform.
  LeanPub has many benefits (I should write a post some day talking about) and one of them are you write the book using the markdown notation (really a slightly extended dialect) and they generate automatically your book in PDF, ePub and mobi formats.

frontmatter.title: Feedback for The book of OpenLayers3

node.excerpt: Finally I have decided to use LeanPub as the platform to publish my book. Here you can see the public page with a description about it: The book of OpenLayers3. Hope within a couple of weeks I can publish a sample chapter.

frontmatter.title: Professional purposes for the new year 2014

node.excerpt: With the arrival of each new year everybody has new great purposes and new goals to achieve. I'm not talking from the personal point of view but the professional too: practice more sport, to quit smoke, read some book, learn a new programming language, ...
I was thinking on it for a long time, but due a lack of free time I never started. Finally I can officially say I have start writing The book of OpenLayers3.
